QuestData.Title: WANTED: Hilaani
QuestData.Description: We need more meat, commander.$B$BI know what you're thinking. What about all of that meat right behind me?$B$BThat's the problem. It'll be gone in a day if we're lucky.$B$BThere's a riverbeast that lives in the lake to the south. Locals call her Hilaani. Massive, lots of meat.$B$BIf you would take down the beast and bring me her meat, your wolves will be better off for it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Hilaani and bring a Pile of Riverbeast Meat to Beastmaster Tagh.
QuestData.RewardText: Is that what I think it is? You are too kind, commander!
